doUpload

private boolean doUpload(FileData[] filesA,
                         int nbFilesToUpload,
                         int iTotalFileCount)
Actually do file upload. It's called by the run methods, once for all files, or file by file, depending on the UploadPolicy.

Parameters:
filesA - An array of FileData, that contains all files to upload in this HTTP request.
nbFilesToUpload - The number of files in filesA to use (indice 0 to nbFilesToUpload-1).
iTotalFileCount - The total number of files that are to upload. It is used to generate the "file 1 out of 4 " message, on the progress bar.

prepareUpload

private boolean prepareUpload()
This method create a thread that will call FileData.beforeUpload for each fileData to upload.

close

public void close()
